title: krogothmanhattan
author: krogothmanhattan
content: CYPHER HODL PRINTED PHYSICAL BITCOINS¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† Following are 4 Lots. The first Lot has a board with 12 printed Physical Bitcoin loaded with Bitcoin and also each having their own NFT for each individual coin.  A first for Printed Physical Bitcoins. ¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† I only made three boards like this, one for myself and one for my brother....but out of the three boards made, this is the only one having NFTs loaded onto the coins. ¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† Lots 2,3 and 4 are printed coins loaded with BTC and also having their own individual NFTs on each coin as well. lotsMinimum Bid Increment : 0.0005 BTCSNIPE: . 10 minute standard sniping rule - Any bid made within the last 10 minutes of the auction, will restart a 10 minute clock for each bid thereafter. Meaning if the auction ends at 3pm and a bid is made at 2:51, the new ending time is now 3:01. If a following bid is then made at 2:55, the new ending time will be 3:05. This will continue until 10 minutes have elapsed from the last bid.End time: ¬†Sunday 7th August 2022 ¬†3pm ESTPayment Due: Within 24 hours¬†¬† ¬† ¬†The one and ONLY BTC...no other shit coin accepted!¬† Shipping registered only...to the USA $20... $45 overseas.I will not be responsible for any lost or stolen coins during transit outside the USA.If you want FEDEX EXPRESS over night at your expense.Winner has to pay for any import/VAT charges.I reserve the right to refuse certain individuals from this auction.Escrow thru Mopar Mining LLC or MJ, buyer pays fees. Otherwise if no escrow you send first.If escrow is used, I will ship to escrow, he will inspect the coin, release the btc to me and then send to you at your expense.If you are located in the New York City area, we can meet and I can hand in person. Lunch will be on me as always.Winner will reach out to me for payment address
